name: Hiragana Seito Defense
description:
Check out the GitHub link below for more information about the game!

https://github.com/ben842002/hiragana-seito-defense

A 2D typing game designed to help players identify and type Japanese hiragana letters using an English keyboard. Learn hiragana and their corresponding sounds and take down enemies by correctly typing the correct letter! Earn coins with each enemy takedown to buy buffs.

Any constructive feedback or suggestions for new features is greatly appreciated! Email me at: torngamedev@gmail.com
